title: Performance deviation analysis and reliability improvement during experimental development of lab-scale solid oxide single cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02581D, Review Article
Zhixin (Veela) Luo, Zehua Wang, Tianjiu Zhu, Yufei Song, Zezhou Lin, San Ping Jiang, Zhonghua Zhu, Zongping Shao
Solid oxide electrochemical cells (SOCs), an elevated-temperature energy storage and conversion device, are anticipated to play a pivotal role in future sustainable energy systems. Considerable research efforts have been devoted...
